title: Black Screen after Champ Select
body:
Hi! I posted this on the 6.20 Buglist megathread as well and just thought I should post it here to see if I could get any help. I'm still having the same problems in 6.21!

Server: NA
Type of Bug: Client/In-Game
Description: Game does not load in after Champion select in Normal Blind, Normal Draft, or Ranked. The game opens to a black screen then gives the error "You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again." The game closes, then the client comes up and asks you to reconnect but it does the same thing no matter how many times you reconnect. It only occurs for that game and then the next few rounds, the game has no problem loading in.
Video / Screenshot: It's a black screen.
Steps to reproduce: Attempt to go into a game.
Expected result: Supposed to show champions and load into game.
Observed result: Simply goes to black screen and never loads no matter how many times you try to reconnect.
Reproduction rate: Can happen ever other game or like after 5 games.
System specs: Macbook Pro (Mid-2012), i7-3720QM, GT 650M 1 GB, 10.12 Sierra

I really need help with this, I have now have 9 games with a 20 minute leavebuster because of this bug :(

-SilentHypnosis

replies.body:
Black screens in the client before loading into a match are typically caused by your client being unable to reach specific servers. I suggest ensuring your local network settings are aligned with our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) as your next step in troubleshooting.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.

Hi!

  I know it is not a network problem because I have a wired connection and other games work perfectly fine with my internet. It must be something to do with the Mac Client. I went through the connection guide and edited the DNS settings as that was the only potential problem I saw. The problem has still not been fixed.

Thanks,
SilentHypnosis

If this were a problem with the Mac client, it would be affecting *everyone* using the Mac client. Since we're not getting bombarded with reports, and because all servers your access online reside in different geolocations, It's definitely possible for something to be wrong with your network routing *specifically* to the League servers. 

I *strongly encourage* you to work through **all** the steps in that guide so we can confirm your local settings are 100% good. Let me know the results.

Hey!

After deleting the game and redownloding the game again, I ran through the guide one more time. I have been running on a wired connection, I turned the firewall off, configured the DNS as shown, used the packet loss tool (no packet loss problems here), played League with that being the only open application, updated to the most recent version of OS X Sierra, changed the Admin settings for League, and lastly verified there were no proxies in use (I don't use a VPN). Even then, I encountered the problem after playing 2 games just fine.

Based on this, perhaps the problem has something to do with the ports as that is the only thing I cannot verify as I cannot log into my University's router. I don't understand why ports would cause the game to not work after several games work.

A very confused,
SilentHypnosis

There may be deeper issues along your route to the servers. I recommend we take a deeper look at this in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). One of our tech specialists will be able to dive into some [Hextech Logs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) if you attach them to your ticket.

Let me know if you have any issues submitting the ticket.
Another thing discovered! I can use op.gg's spectator system (copy pasting the code into terminal) to spectate the game that I can't connect to! This is so very weird D:

On top of this bug being seriously annoying, I am getting punished for it as well. I have received LeaveBuster at least twice this week for five - 20 minute periods because I never connect to the game after champ select and my team has to end up voting for a remake. I am trying to play ranked and I cannot because of fear that I will disconnect after champ select and get demoted.
